monitor.monitor



class Monitor: gui.guielement.GUIElement;
Displays various debugging/profiling information about engine subsystems.

static uint font_size();
Return font size to be used by monitor widgets.

void add_monitorable(string name, Monitorable monitorable);
Add a monitorable with specified name.

A menu item for the monitorable will appear with specified name, providing access to monitor menu of the monitorable.

Params:
string name String to use the name of the monitorable (as menu item text)
Monitorable monitorable Monitorable to add.

void remove_monitorable(Monitorable monitorable);
Remove specified monitorable.

Menu item for the monitorable wil be removed, and if its menu or any of its monitors are active, they'll be disabled.

Params:
Monitorable monitorable Monitorable to remove.

this(GUIElementParams params, MonitorableData[] monitorables);
Construct a new monitor with specified parameters.

See Also:
GUIElement.this

Params:
GUIElementParams params Parameters for GUIElement constructor.
MonitorableData[] monitorables Interfaces to classes to monitor, with names to use.

class MonitorFactory: gui.guielement.GUIElementFactoryBase!(Monitor).GUIElementFactoryBase;
Factory used for monitor construction.

See Also:
GUIElementFactoryBase

Params:
add_monitorable Add a class to be monitored, with specified name.
